# Unicode.GeneralCategory.closePunctuation

**Case**

A closing punctuation mark of a pair.

## Declaration

```swift
case closePunctuation
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Close_Punctuation` (abbreviated `Pe`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.closePunctuation
